name: Wendy H. Kroon, M.S., B.S.
resume_snippet: Wendy H. Kroon, M.S., B.S. PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY:	  Expert quality assurance auditor with experience in FDA/OECD/EPA Good Laboratory Practices, Good Clinical Practices E6 R3, animal health GLPs and Good Clinical Practices (VICH GL9), and some aspects of Good Manufacturing Practices.  Compare documents and facilities versus protocols, SOPs, and regulations to uncover compliance issues.    SKILLS: Apply compliance regulations to new situations.   Apply common sense to regulatory implementation.
